title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration. Features include admin dashboard, inventory management, and order tracking.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking. Includes drag-and-drop functionality and deadline notifications.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current conditions, forecasts, and weather maps. Features location-based weather data and interactive charts for weather trends.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features dark theme, smooth animations, and optimized performance.

title: Blog CMS
description: A content management system for blogs with markdown support, user roles, and SEO optimization. Includes admin panel for content management and analytics dashboard.

title: Data Visualization Tool
description: An interactive data visualization tool for analyzing and presenting complex datasets. Features multiple chart types, filtering options, and export capabilities.
